content.en: Quantum dynamics advancements: Scientists have been working on improving the internal consistency in trajectory surface hopping, a method used in molecular dynamics with quantum transitions. They have also developed algorithms to implement surface hopping molecular dynamics using semiempirical methods and to correct the overcoherence problem in surface hopping. These advancements in algorithms are helping researchers better understand nonadiabatic dynamics and excited-state molecular dynamics.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for kvantedynamik: Forskere har arbejdet på at forbedre den interne konsistens i trajectory surface hopping, en metode der anvendes i molekylær dynamik med kvantetransitioner. De har også udviklet algoritmer til at implementere surface hopping molekylær dynamik ved hjælp af semiempiriske metoder og til at korrigere overkoherensproblemet i surface hopping. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmer hjælper forskere med bedre at forstå non-adiabatisk dynamik og eksciteret-tilstands molekylær dynamik.
